accessibility.text: @Louis_CAD
Don't let your coroutines be garbage collected
@Louis_CAD
When a coroutine is suspended, no thread is being blocked by it.
Don't let your coroutines be garbage collected

When a coroutine is suspended, no thread is being blocked by it.
Therefore, it could be subject to garbage collection.
Don't let your coroutines be garbage collected

When a coroutine is suspended, no thread is being blocked by it.
Therefore, it could be subject to garbage collection.
2 things can prevent that from happening:
Don't let your coroutines be garbage collected
@Louis_CAD
Don't let your coroutines be garbage collected
@Louis_CAD
When a coroutine is suspended, no thread is being blocked by it.
Therefore, it could be subject to garbage collection.
2 things can prevent that from happening:
The Job inside the scope keeps a strong reference to child Jobs and running coroutines except when it doesn't
The continuation is referenced by a listener that is registered with a strong reference.
Don't let your coroutines be garbage collected
